name: Pandemic Shootout
description:
1. Fight for your survival in a night of Terror;
  2. Kill zombies as you proceed through mazes to save your skin;
  3. Use the light in your favor as it runs out and darkness follows;
  4.  You have a turning meter and if it fills up if you get hit by the zombies... you dead meat, or alive, your call;
  5. Use the gun for range attack and the melee system for close combat
